channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Bollard broken off at base, 12th December
item.description:
Junction of Brookfield Road and Oldbury Orchard
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oldbury Orchard, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Complete bollard is damaged (Non illuminating bollard or post)

item.title: Unlit crossing feature damaging car tyres, 12th December
item.description:
Crossing area juts into the road and is not lit. This image is the second car in the last 10 days that has hit the jutting feature causing damage to tyres. This evening was a car which blew 2 tyres, the one 10 days ago had a passenger in the car who was aged 90 and had to wait 4 hours for breakdown to replace blown tyre. Please get this fixed before a cyclist is killed or more cars are damaged. I see this has already been raised but nothing done yet.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Teme Road, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Bollard cover is off and causing a trip hazard/obstruction (Non illuminating bollard or post)

item.title: Local church bus parking on grass, 12th December
item.description:
There is a mini bus which is parking, at times quite wildly on the grass verge. It's killing the grass and churning up mud. Whilst other cars do also park there they park considerably and are moved more than once a week.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Vervain Close, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish under the subway linking Medoc Close with Thomond Close, 12th December
item.description:
There is a considerable amount of litter, cans and bottles in the subway under Windyridge Road ,this makes the subway unpleasant for anyone to use
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Windyridge Road, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Junction littered with potholes with one very large pothole on Mill Lane, 12th December
item.description:
Junction between Mill Lane and Vicarage Lane littered with potholes with one very deep one on Mill Lane. Pothole on Mill Lane likely to be deeper than a tennis ball
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Mill Lane, Brockworth, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The drain is blocked problem, 12th December
item.description:
there is a huge buildup of leaf debris which is stopping water flowing away to the drain and causing a huge puddle. If the puddle gets any bigger, it will start to encroach on the pavement outside this block of flats. The leaves need clearing urgently.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW6 Potholes problem, 12th December
item.description:

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Leaves building up, 12th December
item.description:
The permitted parking spaces have become very muddy due to the recent wet weather and fallen leaves. The leaves are now wet and compacted, making the ground slippery and messy. This creates a hazard for pedestrians as well as drivers, increasing the risk of slips and falls. Some of the leaves are also blocking drains, which could make the mud and water buildup worse if not cleared. Clearing the leaves and addressing the mud would help make the parking spaces safer and prevent further drainage problems.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Selkirk Street, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW6 Potholes problem, 12th December
